name: Monke

Multiplayer working with a virtual private network (VPN).

Press the Tilde Key to open the command line.

>"Host" to host a game on the map Arena01

>"Join IPv4 Address" to join a game. IPv4 Address being the host's IP. You can replace "Join" with "Open".

>"Open MapName?listen" to host a game on the desired map. MapName being the desired map's name. remove "?listen" to open a game without hosting.
